applied_job_description:
Development of reports, dashboards, and data models using IBM Cognos
Gathering and formalizing business requirements
Creation and optimization of Framework Manager packages
Participation in BI governance and data architecture
Technology watch and continuous improvement
Support, training, and mentoring of junior profiles
Collaboration with DWH & ETL teams
IBM Cognos (Report Studio, Dashboarding, Framework Manager, Data Sets, Data Modules)
SQL (Oracle, SQL Server, Postgres)
Data modeling (Snowflake, Star Schema)
Microsoft Excel (advanced level)
Agile methodology (desired)
5+ years of experience in BI, including at least 3 years with Cognos
An IBM Cognos certification is a plus
Knowledge of Power BI / Tableau is appreciated
French B2 / English B2
candidate_job_title: Consultante Power BI at Amaris Consulting
candidate_background: INGENIEUR EN BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE with experience in developing business intelligence solutions, data modeling, and data visualization using various tools like Power BI, MSBI, and other BI tools.

match_results.technical_skills: Strong experience with Power BI and MSBI. Familiarity with various database technologies and data visualization tools.
match_results.experience_level: Senior level experience as a consultant in BI
match_results.education: Degree in Business Intelligence from ESPRIT
match_results.certifications: No IBM Cognos certification mentioned, but has other relevant certifications

strengths: Strong experience in Business Intelligence and Data Analytics
Excellent educational background in Business Intelligence
Proficient in multiple BI tools and technologies
gaps: Lack of direct experience with IBM Cognos
No mention of IBM Cognos certification
rationale: The candidate has a strong background in Business Intelligence and Data Analytics, with significant experience in Power BI and MSBI. The educational background is excellent, with a degree in Business Intelligence. The candidate is also bilingual in English and French, meeting the language requirements. However, there is a gap in direct experience with IBM Cognos and no mention of an IBM Cognos certification.
risk: The lack of direct experience with IBM Cognos could be a risk, but the candidate's overall strong background in BI and data analytics might mitigate this.
next_steps: Technical interview focusing on IBM Cognos skills and experience
Assessment of the candidate's ability to adapt to IBM Cognos
Reference checks to verify previous experience and skills
